page.title: 02The Wigtown Cattle Show
page.content: The Wigtown Cattle Show is an annual event, which takes places in Southfield park, Wigtown. It is one of the biggest one-day{farming}shows in Scotland, and often attracts crowds of over 10,000 people. The Cattle show originally started in 1811 and over the years it has changed and grown. The show is very rarely cancelled. In the past it has been cancelled because of a suspected outbreak of foot and mouth disease. It has also been cancelled due to very wet weather. The show is organised by an executive committee, which is made up of 12 people. Planning for the show takes a long time, so as soon as one show ends the planning for the next years' show begins. The show has many attractions. There are the obvious{ {agriculture}competitions,.............
